scripts.build:ui: @powershell New-Item -ItemType Directory dist -Force && @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../../../fullstackcourse/blogs/ && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item -Recurse -Force dist ../../../fullstackcourse-backend/blogs-backend/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
